attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For goodness sake, who is in control of the people who give their lives to their country, and live for their country, and can always be relied upon.Support our country support our people, who asked anyone to be british it was a choice, and still is somthing to stand by

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
